title: Pujie Blue - Wear Watch Face
summary: Modern blue accented watch face with animated battery and date indicator.
description: Modern blue accented watch face with animated battery and date indicator for Android Wear.The watch face contains:✔ analog watch hands (hour, minutes, seconds)✔ battery indicator, displaying colored ring. (red when lower than 20, orange when lower than 50, green otherwise)✔ date indicator, displaying colored ring denoting the month progress✔ highly visible watch hands✔ black ambient state on devices with an Amoled or Oled screen✔ animations from ambient to interactive state✔ responds to peek cards by moving the indicators to the top sectionTo install:1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Pujie Blue as you watch faceCompatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch.Check out my other watchfaces too at: http://goo.gl/OxiezW!! Please contact me if you have any trouble installing the app !!
descriptionHTML:
Modern blue accented watch face with animated battery and date indicator for Android Wear.

The watch face contains:

✔ analog watch hands (hour, minutes, seconds)
✔ battery indicator, displaying colored ring. (red when lower than 20, orange when lower than 50, green otherwise)
✔ date indicator, displaying colored ring denoting the month progress
✔ highly visible watch hands
✔ black ambient state on devices with an Amoled or Oled screen
✔ animations from ambient to interactive state
✔ responds to peek cards by moving the indicators to the top section


To install:
1. After install run 'Resync app' on Android Wear App.
2. Long press your android wear watch and choose Pujie Blue as you watch face

Compatible with Moto360, LG G Watch R, LG G Watch, Samsung Gear Live, Sony Smartwatch 3 & Asus ZenWatch.

Check out my other watchfaces too at: http://goo.gl/OxiezW

!! Please contact me if you have any trouble installing the app !!
comments: The best I've seen. Even though this may be less flexible than the black face (which I have) these are still the best quality faces for my LG R out there. The quality of the rendering is superb. Worth every penny, thanks.
Looks blurry on Moto 360 The watch face looks blurry on my Moto 360.
Looks great, but more custom option's please. Some more settings please though dev, like the black version which has many options for customising.
Help! Can't find face? Download and install but can't find app.. Really like the black version got this one bec  I want the same thing just white background.
Nice watch face Needs more settings!
Never shows up on my lg watch r urban
recentChanges: - Indicators move up when peek card is visible
- Black ambient mode on devices with Oled or Amoled screens
